speaker: Upper Slopes
lines: You climb onto upper slopes of scree and black ice.
A broken cart holds rusted picks and a prayer board.
Ravens ride the updrafts close to the ground.
Frost feathers grow from old iron nails in a stump.
Your hands numb; you flex them and keep moving.
A single bell rings once above you.

choices.text: A roar from a ledge above—stand fast.
A horned shape cuts across the ridge—challenge it.
Pick your way toward the summit shrine.
